name: Cardano Starter (Local Overrides)
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; (command -v corepack >/dev/null 2>&1 && corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@9 --activate) || true; (command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm -v) || true; pnpm install || true; bash .devcontainer/scripts/install-aiken.sh'
